Umbul Ponggok yang Indah, Warganya Juga Sejahtera
01 Nov 2019, 07:55 by Achmad Syauqi


Umbul Ponggok (Bayu Ardi Isnanto/detikcom)

Klaten - Umbul Ponggok yang dipuji media internasional, bisa jadi contoh destinasi wisata lainnya di Indonesia. Kehidupan masyarakat desanya begitu sejahtera.Media asal Inggris, Daily Mail dan media asal Hong Kong, South China Morning Post memuji Umbul Ponggok sebagai destinasi wisata yang menawan. Tak hanya keindahannya saja, tapi kesadaran masyarakatnya dan bagaimana perekonomian setempat menjadi bergeliat.BACA JUGA: Destinasi Wisata di Klaten Ini Dipuji Media Inggris dan ChinaUmbul Ponggok lokasinya di Desa Ponggok, Kecamatan Polanharjo, Kabupaten Klaten, Jawa Tengah. Terletak di sisi utara Kabupaten Klaten berjarak 40 kilometer dari Kota Yogya maupun Solo.


Foto-foto bawah air di Umbul Ponggok (Bayu Ardi Isnanto/detikcom)

Kepala Desa Ponggok, Junaidi Mulyono menjelaskan tentang pengelolaan Umbul Ponggok dan dampak positif yang dirasakan warganya pada tiga tahun terakhir.Sebelum tahun 2008, pendapatan asli desa (PAD) berkisar Rp 15 juta per tahun. Namun sejak tahun 2008, PAD terus meningkat tajam dari angka belasan juta, puluhan juta, ratusan juta sampai miliaran. Menurut catatan, tahun 2015 desa mampu mencatatkan pendapatan Rp 5,1 miliar dari target hanya Rp 3,8 miliar. Tahun 2016, mentargetkan PAD Rp 9, 1 miliar dapat Rp 14 miliar. Dari PAD sebesar itu Umbul Ponggok menyumbang sebesar Rp 6-8 miliar per tahun sampai 2018."Wisata air itu tiga tahun dan titik puncaknya di 2016," terang Junaidi.BACA JUGA: Mengenali Umbul Ponggok yang Dipuji Media InternasionalJunaidi menjelaskan, peluang pariwisata terbuka pada Umbul Ponggok. Warganya pun diarahkan untuk menjajakan kuliner sampai membuat home stay.


Foto: (Achmad Syauqi/detikcom)

"Ada aspek studi dan sosial. Kami pun mengembangkan wisata studi," ujarnya.Apa itu wisata studi?"Kami menangkap peluang banyaknya daerah dan warga yang ingin mengetahui pengalaman dan success story Desa Ponggok. Maka kami arahkan studi wisata sehingga tidak hanya wisata air tetapi bidang lain sepertikuliner dan sebagainya," jawab Juanidi."Dengan wisata studi itu, tamu yang datang tidak hanya mengunjungi Umbul Ponggok tetapi juga berkeliling, berdiskusi, dan berinteraksi dengan warga sekitar. Hampir semua wilayah di Indonesia sudah berkunjung ke Umbul Ponggok. Mulai dari kepala desa, pejabat pemerintahan Pemkab dan provinsi dan pengusaha," paparnya.


Foto: (Achmad Syauqi/detikcom)

Dari pengelolaan BUMDes dengan ujung tombak wisata air Umbul Ponggok itu, saat ini pemerintah desa sudah mampu membiayai warganya untuk kuliah, membayar jaminan sosial, sampai merehab rumah tidak layak. Hasil pengelolaan pendapatan tersebut akan diupayakan kembali ke masyarakat"Usaha nantinya tidak hanya mengejar profit tetapi bagaimana membangun lingkungan, sosial dan budaya sedang diupayakan," tutup Junaidi.Simak Video "Dipuji Media Internasional, Ini Keindahan Umbul Ponggok"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/aff)

Beautiful Umbul Ponggok, The People Are Also Prosperous
Nov 01 2019, 07:55 by Achmad Syauqi


Umbul Ponggok (Bayu Ardi Isnanto / detikcom)

Klaten - Umbul Ponggok which is praised by international media, could be an example of other tourist destinations in Indonesia. The life of the village community is so prosperous. Media from England, Daily Mail and media from Hong Kong, South China Morning Post praised Umbul Ponggok as a charming tourist destination. Not only the beauty, but also the awareness of the people and how the local economy is stretched. READ ALSO: This Tourist Destination in Klaten is praised by the British and Chinese media. The location of Ponggok is located in Ponggok Village, Polanharjo District, Klaten Regency, Central Java. Located on the north side of Klaten Regency, it is 40 kilometers from the cities of Yogya and Solo.


Underwater photos in Umbul Ponggok (Bayu Ardi Isnanto / detikcom)

Head of Ponggok Village, Junaidi Mulyono explained about the management of Ponggok Umbul and the positive impact felt by its citizens in the last three years. Before 2008, village original income (PAD) was around Rp. 15 million per year. But since 2008, PAD has continued to increase sharply from tens of millions, tens of millions, hundreds of millions to billions. According to records, in 2015 the village was able to record an income of Rp 5.1 billion from a target of only Rp 3.8 billion. In 2016, targeting PAD Rp 9, 1 billion to Rp 14 billion. From PAD of that amount Umbul Ponggok contributes Rp 6-8 billion per year until 2018. "Water tourism is three years and its peak point in 2016," explained Junaidi. READ ALSO: Recognizing Ponggok Umbul Praised by International Media Juidi explained, tourism opportunities are open to Umbul Ponggok. Its citizens are directed to peddle culinary cuisine to make a home stay.


Photo: (Achmad Syauqi / detikcom)

"There are study and social aspects. We also develop study tours," he said. What are study tours? "We seize the opportunity of many regions and residents who want to know the experience and success story of Ponggok Village. So we direct study tours so that they are not only water tourism but other fields such as culinary and so on, "Juanidi answered." With the study tour, guests who come not only visit Umbul Ponggok but also tour, discuss, and interact with local residents. Almost all regions in Indonesia have visited Umbul Ponggok. Starting from the head villages, district and provincial government officials and businessmen, "he explained.


Photo: (Achmad Syauqi / detikcom)

From the management of BUMDes with the spearhead of the Umbul Ponggok water tourism, at this time the village government has been able to finance its citizens to study, pay social security, to rehabilitate improper homes. The results of the revenue management will be sought back to the community "Efforts will not only pursue profit but how to develop the environment, social and culture are being pursued," Junaidi closed.
